citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). USE ME
citations.narrative:
Two IACUC protocols were approved by a vote of only 2 of the 5 member IACUC. A quorum, or majority of the Committee
members, is required for an approval vote during full Committee review of animal activities. The IACUC must ensure that
voting is conducted in compliance with the requirements for constitution of a quorum.
Correct by: next scheduled IACUC meeting
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.31(d)(2) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). USE ME 
Two IACUC protocols were approved by a vote of only 2 of the 5 member IACUC. A quorum, or majority of the Committee 
members, is required for an approval vote during full Committee review of animal activities. The IACUC must ensure that 
voting is conducted in compliance with the requirements for constitution of a quorum. 
 
Correct by: next scheduled IACUC meeting 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
End Section
